nodes.documentation:
Bid on the auction with the value sent
 together with this transaction.
 The value will only be refunded if the
 auction is not won.
nodes.name: bid

nodes.documentation: Withdraw a bid that was overbid.
nodes.name: withdraw

nodes.documentation:
End the auction and send the highest bid
 to the beneficiary.
nodes.name: auctionEnd
